title: Morning Joe 9/1/21
description: President Joe Biden on Tuesday gave a forceful defense of his decision to pull troops from Afghanistan as critics question the chaotic final chapter of the nation's longest war.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
